<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6252) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238)

</column>

---

You have familiarity with all weapons in the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) and [crossbow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=17) weapon groups. For the purposes of proficiency, treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons.

If you are at least an expert in the bow or crossbow you are using, you get the critical specialization effect of that weapon when you get a critical hit with it.

<title level="2">Archer Dedication leads to...</title>
[Archer's Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=6255), [Crossbow Terror](/Feats.aspx?ID=6254), [Quick Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=6253), [Unobstructed Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=6256)
name: Archer Dedication
